Tezpur University Recruitment 2025 - Apply for 06 Project Associate Posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 22, 2025, 15:15 IST
 Tezpur University
 6 Jobs |  Posted On : 22-Aug-2025 |  Assam |  Salary : 25,000 to 35,000




FOLLOW

The Tezpur University has announced the latest job notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 06 Project Associate Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.E, M.Tech, and M.Sc. can grab this chance and apply for the Tezpur University Recruitment 2025. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interestd and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of application.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government JObs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Assam

Tezpur University Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Project Associate 	06	M.E,/M.Tech, M.Sc

Age Limit for the Tezpur University Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 35 years.

Selection Process for the Tezpur University Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the Tezpur University Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 25,000 /-per month.
The Maximum Salary: Rs. 35,000 /- per month.

Application fee for the Tezpur University Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the Tezpur University Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Project Associate Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form carefully.
Then, send the application form to the email address given below.

Email Address

ubora@tezu.ac.in

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	19-08-2025
Last Date of Application	02-09-2025

 

Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
